title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 sees first discount, Galaxy S22 series $100 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung’s new Galaxy Tab A8 on sale for the first time. That’s alongside deals on Samsung Galaxy Watch 4/Classic LTE models at $80 off, plus ongoing Galaxy S22 pre-order price cuts. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 sees first discount, Galaxy S22 series $100 off, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's new Galaxy Tab A8 is on sale for the very first time at $200, alongside ongoing Galaxy S22 series pre-orders and more.
